title: The hurte of hering masse. Set forth by the faithfull seruau[n]t of god [and] constant marter of Christ. Ihon̄ Bradforth, whe[n] he was prisoner in the Tower of London
author: Bradford, John, 1510?-1555.
publisher: By Wyllyam Copland, for Wyllyam Martyne, and ar to be solde at his shope ioininge to the mydle North dore of Paules, at the sygne of the blacke boys,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
